description:
Subway Boss Emmet`s Eelektross was first seen powering a motor for a railway cart with its electricity. It was able to adjust the speed of the cart by adjusting how much electricity it generated.
2-on-2 Battle against Satoshi and Dent
As Cilan completed the stamp rally, he got the opportunity to battle the Subway Masters. Subway Boss Emmet sent out his Eelektross to battle against Cilan`s Pansage and Ash`s Tepig. The battle started off slowly for the Subway Masters as Cilan`s Pansage and Ash`s Tepig worked well together. Subway Boss Emmet`s Eelektross and Subway Boss Ingo`s Chandelure fought back though as Subway Boss Emmet`s Eelektross used Acid on Cilan`s Pansage and Ash`s Tepig and made them lose their momentum. Subway Boss Emmet`s Eelektross then used Thunderbolt on the handrail in order to paralyze Cilan`s Pansage who then fell on Ash`s Tepig. It then finished them off with a Thunderbolt to give the Subway Masters the win in the 2-on-2 battle.
name: Shibirudon (Subway Master Kudari)
